question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Hvorfor er Kota Bogor i Indonesien kendt som "Regnbyen"?
answer: Kota Bogor i Indonesien er kendt som "Regnbyen" på grund af dens højfrekvente og intense regnvejrsdage året rundt.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor in Indonesia is known as the "Rain City" due to its high frequency and intense rainy days all year round.
